actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt the holding of any private foundation in certain public utilities from the tax on excess business holdings.

summary.text: Excludes the holdings of any private foundation in qualified public utilities from the tax on excess business holdings, provided such a foundation holds more than 50 percent of the voting stock of such corporation, and the gross sales did not exceed $10,000,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt the holding of any private foundation in certain public utilities from the tax on excess business holdings.
